lines: complete plastic construction is hot wire cuttable for foam and plastic packaging
3m thermal transfer label materials, 7818, silver, 6 in x 1668 ft (152.4 mm x 508.4 m)
3m thermal transfer label materials are versatile and durable label stocks
they provide excellent thermal stability and moisture resistance for use in demanding applications, such as bar code tracking
3m thermal transfer label materials are made of a durable high performance material that offers thermal stability and moisture resistance
higher temperature resistance than two-part epoxy adhesives
versatile materials produced for use in a variety of applications
the topcoat is designed for use with a wide variety of inks and the high performance adhesive offers excellent adhesion to a variety of substrates.
brand and instruction labels, warning labels
